title: Was Kamala Harris called "Hoy " on the car salesman's keyboard?
subtitle: The reference was to the United States Senator in California, who made history the first black woman on the ticket of the head of a major political party.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In August 2020, a car agency in Massachusetts created a billboard referring to the American Democratic Presidential candidate for 2020, Joe Biden, and the candidate for Vice-President, Kamala Harris, named "Jo Walho."
